title: Example OAuth/OIDC Walkthrough
heading: Example OAuth/OIDC Walkthrough
content:
The access\_token can be used to query [www.clever.com/v3.0/me](/docs/api-v3-upgrade-guide#5-accounting-for-identity-api-changes-sso). This can be done easily in Postman by opening a new GET query, then going to the Authorization tab and setting the Type to Bearer token. You can then paste the access\_token into the field and hit Send!.

  

For the id\_token, you can paste this into a JSON Web Token decoder that allows users to decode such tokens.
